vsParam:
Oh, [px]!
The smart medicine is done!

Although I came up with this idea, is it really OK...
I'm starting to worry...

Ha ha ha, [px]'s medicine never fails!
So... I'm drinking it. Glug, glug...

Phew... My mind becomes clearer.
Its effect is immediate.

Wow, you really become... smarter?
Huh, is it for real!? Are you tricking me!?

No, I'm not tricking you.
I do become smarter after drinking [px]'s medicine.

Ho ho, now I can go to classes.
And enjoy a student's life.

Oh, oh... I'm sorry, but I still can't believe it.
Can you read this reference book?

Sure, no problem. Hmm...
The so called magic, is like... a faucet of mana...

Wow, you just read it fluently!
Amazing, it's so amazing, Peppermint!

No, wait!
Something is wrong with her?

Magic... Element...
Rich imagination... Consumption of mana... Ah, ah, ahhhhhh...

Uh, it's terrible, right...
I'll make you some medicine to prevent an upset stomach...

Ahhhhh! P-Peppermint!?
Are you alright, Peppermint!?
Magic... Mana... Imagination... Oh hee, oh hee hee...

Gee, her forehead is burning... Even though her tone
sounds smarter, her cranial capacity remains unchanged...
I kind of anticipated it earlier.

Oh hee hee... Getting smarter, going to classes...
Being complimented by [px]... Oh hee hee... (Passing out)
